settings.title: WE ARE DEDICATED TO PROVIDING CORRECTIVE SKINCARE TREATMENTS WITH A PURPOSE
settings.description: Whether clients are looking for assistance with an anti-aging regimen, a remedial treatment for acneic skin, or simply looking to indulge in therapeutic experience, our custom facials offer solutions for every skin type.

settings.title: INITIAL CONSULATION AND GLOW FACIAL
settings.description: We book all first time clients for a 90-minute experience with one of our licensed estheticians. We start with a gentle cleansing and skin analysis while asking important questions to have a good understanding of the client's skin type, current lifestyle habits, problematic areas, allergies and long-term skin goals. The esthetician then determines the proper course of action and selects specific products to use throughout the facial ranging from our very own KH Skin Lab products to other carefully chosen medical grade products. Following the facial, the esthetician creates a customized take-home skin care regimen with samples to best benefit the client’s skin and maintain optimal results between treatments. A complimentary two-week follow-up appointment is scheduled to ensure that the client’s skin is responding accordingly.

settings.title: THE GLOW FACIAL
settings.description: Our most popular treatment is an hour-long experience tailored to each client’s skin type that begins with a deep steam cleaning followed by any necessary extractions, high frequency treatment to eliminate any toxins and bacteria, microdermabrasion and exfoliation treatment complimented by dermaplaning where a layer of peach-fuzz facial hair is shaved leaving the skin ultra smooth and open for maximum product absorption. After dermaplaning, a lymphatic massage is performed to improve circulation and reduce puffiness and the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Lastly, an optional custom chemical peel can be applied to regenerate and rejuvenate skin on a deeper cellular level.

settings.description_left: A 45-minute version of the Glow Facial sans the lymphac massage; customized to your individual needs and concerns.
settings.description_right: Our most luxurious and pampering service is a full hour and a half. It includes all the processes featured in the Glow Facial with an extended upper body massage.

settings.description_left: A 45-minute version of the Glow Facial sans the lymphac massage; customized to your individual needs and concerns.
settings.description_right: Our most luxurious and pampering service is a full hour and a half. It includes all the processes featured in the Glow Facial with an extended upper body massage.

settings.title: GENTLEMAN'S FACIAL
settings.description: This 75-minute service includes a deep steam cleaning with any necessary extractions followed by a high frequency anti-bacterial treatment. Next comes microdermabrasion, dermaplaning (as needed), a lymphatic massage and a light chemical peel, as well as brow grooming and nose and ear waxing, as desired.

settings.description_left: Our Teen Clean Facial is an adolescent- friendly facial specifically formulated to treat breakouts and acne, control oil production, unplug compactions, eliminate bacteria and reduce inflammation. This deep cleansing treatment is 45 minutes long and focuses on gentle extractions and educating those under 18 on proper skincare habits for optimal skin health.
settings.description_right: HydraFacial™ is the only hydradermabrasion procedure that combines cleaning, extraction, hydration and an oxidant protection simultaneously. The HydraFacialTM treatment removes dead skin cells and extracts impurities while bathing the new skin with cleansing, hydrating and moisturizing serums. This three-part facial is designed for all skin types and addresses all skincare needs. Specific concerns? Ask about our boosts!

settings.title: HIGH FREQUENCY + EXTRACTIONS
settings.description: This a la carte fix-it option offers expert extracons followed by a high frequency treatment to help calm the skin, eliminate acne and kill bacteria. An emergency soluon for breakouts and flare ups available in increments of 15 and 30 minutes.

settings.quote: Imperfections are beautiful, all you need is a little GLOW
